parse.title: List of Cambridge Companions to Music

text.*:
The Cambridge Companions to Music form a book series published by Cambridge University Press. Each book is a collection of essays on the topic commissioned by the publisher.[1]

Volumes (sortable table)[edit]

The Cambridge Companion...
